Text: Chimères (English: "Chimeras") is a 2013 horror film and the feature film directorial debut of Olivier Beguin.

Text: Chimères (film):  The movie had its world premiere on July 5, 2013 at the Neuchâtel International Fantastic Film Festival, where it won a special mention for best feature film.
